title: Raspberry Pi 3b+ / 4b support
body: With the release of the Raspberry Pi 4, there is a need to create support for these new, powerful devices. With Windows IoT Core not even supporting the 3b+ yet, I have doubts this will happen. It's hard to convince my boss to use Windows IoT Core when most sensors/displays aren't supported, and that the most recent release is still targeting a 3 year old device.
